import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getDetail } from '../redux/actions'; import loading from '../assets/cargando.gif' import style from '../css/Detail.module.css' import EvolutionChain from './EvolutionChain'; export default function Detail(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getDetail(props.match.params.id)); }, [dispatch]) const P = useSelector(state => state.detail) // P = current pokemon const [section, setSection] = useState(1); function handleSection(e) { if (e.target.innerHTML === 'About' && !P[0].createdInDb) { setSection(1); } else if (e.target.innerHTML === 'Base Stats') { setSection(2) } else if (e.target.innerHTML === 'Evolution' && !P[0].createdInDb) { setSection(3) } } return (
{ P.length && P[0].id == props.match.params.id ?

{P[0].id} - {P[0].name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + P[0].name.slice(1)}

{P[0].types ? P[0].types.map(el => { return (el) } ) : Types not found }
{!P[0].createdInDb ?
Description {P[0].description}
Combat
Abilities
{P[0].abilities.length ? P[0].abilities.map(el => { return ( {el.replace('-', ' ')} ) }) : This pokemon has no abilities }
Moves
{P[0].moves.length ? P[0].moves.map(el => { return ( {el.replace('-', ' ')} ) }) : This pokemon has no moves }
Breeding
Specie {P[0].species ? {P[0].species} : This pokemon has no specie }
Habitat {P[0].habitat ? {P[0].habitat} : This pokemon has no habitat }
Growth Rate {P[0].growth ? {P[0].growth} : This pokemon has no growth-rate }
Location Area Encounters
{P[0].locations.length ? P[0].locations.map(el => { return ( {el} ) }) : This pokemon has no encounter locations }
:
}
Hp
100 ? '100%' : P[0].hp + '%' }} per={`${P[0].hp}`} className={style.hp}>
Attack
100 ? '100%' : P[0].attack + '%' }} per={`${P[0].attack}`}>
Defense
100 ? '100%' : P[0].defense + '%' }} per={`${P[0].defense}`}>
Speed
{P[0].weight / 10}kg
Weight
{P[0].height / 10}m
Height
{ !P[0].createdInDb ?
{P[0].happiness}
Happiness
{P[0].capture}
Capture Rate

}
